name: Voodoo Friends
description:
Voodoo Friends is a platform puzzle game, where you are controlling three voodoo dolls on a quest for yarn. To solve the levels you must combine their different abilities, and pierce them with magic needles to give them new powers. A level is completed by reaching the exit, and 1-3 stars are given depending on how many yarn balls you collect.

It's not Flappy Bird.
